description.zh-cn: 对古代中国南方多个民族或部落的统称。
description.en: A collective term for various ancient peoples or tribes who inhabited Southern China.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期位于中国东南部的诸侯国，曾一度称霸。据传为夏朝王室后裔所建。
description.en: A state in southeastern China during the Spring and Autumn period, which once became a hegemon. It was traditionally believed to have been founded by descendants of the Xia dynasty's royal house.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期位于长江下游地区的诸侯国，后被越国所灭。
description.en: A state in the lower Yangtze River region during the Spring and Autumn period, later conquered by the State of Yue.

description.zh-cn: 周朝时期位于长江中游地区的诸侯国。
description.en: A state in the middle Yangtze River region during the Zhou dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 古蜀王子，灭文郎国后建立瓯貉国。
description.en: A prince of the ancient Shu state who conquered Văn Lang and established the state of Âu Lạc.

description.zh-cn: 越南历史传说中的第一个国家，主要由雒越人和西瓯人构成。
description.en: The first legendary state in Vietnamese history, primarily composed of the Lạc Việt and Tây Âu peoples.

description.zh-cn: 由蜀泮在前257年建立的政权，后被赵佗所灭。
description.en: A state established by Thục Phán in 257 BC, later conquered by Zhao Tuo.

description.zh-cn: 南越国创建者，原为秦朝将领。
description.en: Founder of the Nanyue kingdom, originally a general of the Qin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上首个大一统的中央集权制王朝。
description.en: The first unified, centralized imperial dynasty in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝为征服岭南地区百越部落而发动的一系列军事行动。
description.en: A series of military campaigns launched by the Qin dynasty to conquer the Baiyue tribes in the Lingnan region.

description.zh-cn: 古代百越族群的一支，主要分布于今广西地区。
description.en: A branch of the ancient Baiyue peoples, mainly distributed in the present-day Guangxi region.

description.zh-cn: 古代百越族群的一支，主要分布于今越南北部和中国广西南部。
description.en: A branch of the ancient Baiyue peoples, mainly distributed in present-day northern Vietnam and southern Guangxi, China.

description.zh-cn: 由秦朝将领赵佗在岭南地区建立的政权，领有今日广东、广西、海南及越南北部。
description.en: A kingdom founded by the Qin general Zhao Tuo in the Lingnan region, covering present-day Guangdong, Guangxi, Hainan, and northern Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第七位皇帝，在位期间征服了多个百越王国。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Western Han dynasty, who conquered several Baiyue kingdoms during his reign.

description.zh-cn: 汉初在今福建一带由越国后裔建立的王国。
description.en: A kingdom established in the early Han dynasty by descendants of the Yue state in the area of modern Fujian.

description.zh-cn: 汉初在今浙江温州一带建立的王国。
description.en: A kingdom established in the early Han dynasty in the area of modern Wenzhou, Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 位于今云南滇池中心的古代国家，后归降汉朝。
description.en: An ancient kingdom centered around Dian Lake in modern Yunnan, which later submitted to the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 继秦朝之后的大一统王朝，分为西汉和东汉。
description.en: A major Chinese dynasty that succeeded the Qin dynasty, divided into Western Han and Eastern Han.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国西南的古代国家，后被汉朝所灭。
description.en: An ancient state in southwestern China, which was later extinguished by the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国西南的古代方国，曾协助汉朝平叛。
description.en: An ancient state in southwestern China that assisted the Han dynasty in suppressing rebellions.

description.zh-cn: 句町首领，因协助汉朝平叛有功被封为句町王。
description.en: A leader of Gouding who was enfeoffed as King of Gouding for his merit in helping the Han dynasty suppress a rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第八位皇帝。
description.en: The eighth emperor of the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年军阀，为孙吴政权的奠基者之一。
description.en: A warlord in the late Eastern Han dynasty who was one of the founders of the state of Eastern Wu.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年军阀之一。
description.en: A warlord in the late Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国长江流域下游地区的新石器时代文化。
description.en: A Neolithic culture that flourished in the lower Yangtze River basin of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国太湖地区的新石器时代文化，继承自河姆渡文化。
description.en: A Neolithic culture in the Taihu Lake area of China, which succeeded the Hemudu culture.

description.zh-cn: 中国太湖地区的新石器时代文化，是马家浜文化的直接继承者。
description.en: A Neolithic culture in the Taihu Lake area of China, which was the direct successor to the Majiabang culture.

description.zh-cn: 中国新石器时代晚期玉器文化，继承了马家浜文化和崧泽文化。
description.en: A late Neolithic jade culture in China that succeeded the Majiabang and Songze cultures.

description.zh-cn: 公元前473年，越国灭亡吴国，势力范围一度雄踞东南。
description.en: In 473 BC, the State of Yue conquered the State of Wu, and its sphere of influence once dominated the southeast.

description.zh-cn: 公元前306年，楚国乘越国内乱，占领其江东之地，导致越国分崩离析。
description.en: In 306 BC, the State of Chu took advantage of internal turmoil in Yue to occupy its territory east of the Yangtze River, leading to the disintegration of Yue.

description.zh-cn: 公元前257年，蜀泮灭亡文郎国。
description.en: In 257 BC, Thục Phán conquered the state of Văn Lang.

description.zh-cn: 蜀泮在灭亡文郎国后建立了瓯貉国。
description.en: After conquering Văn Lang, Thục Phán established the state of Âu Lạc.

description.zh-cn: 南越王赵佗灭亡瓯貉国。
description.en: Zhao Tuo, king of Nanyue, conquered the state of Âu Lạc.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝于前219年开始发动旨在征服岭南地区百越部落的战争。
description.en: The Qin dynasty launched a war in 219 BC aimed at conquering the Baiyue tribes in the Lingnan region.

description.zh-cn: 秦攻百越之战期间，秦军进攻了西瓯部落。
description.en: During Qin's campaign against the Baiyue, the Qin army attacked the Xi'ou tribes.

description.zh-cn: 秦攻百越之战期间，秦军进攻了骆越部落。
description.en: During Qin's campaign against the Baiyue, the Qin army attacked the Luoyue tribes.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝灭亡后，时任南海尉的赵佗兼并桂林郡、象郡，于前204年建立南越国。
description.en: After the fall of the Qin dynasty, Zhao Tuo, then Commandant of Nanhai, annexed Guilin and Xiang commanderies and founded the Nanyue kingdom in 204 BC.

description.zh-cn: 前138年，闽越发兵围攻东瓯，导致东瓯国举国迁往汉朝江淮地区而灭亡。
description.en: In 138 BC, Minyue dispatched troops to besiege Dong'ou, which led to the entire Dong'ou kingdom relocating to the Jiang-Huai region of the Han dynasty and its subsequent demise.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝派兵攻灭自立为帝的闽越国。
description.en: Emperor Wu of Han sent troops to conquer the Minyue kingdom, which had declared its own emperor.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝于前112年派兵十万分五路进攻南越国，并于次年将其平定。
description.en: In 112 BC, Emperor Wu of Han dispatched 100,000 troops in five columns to attack the Nanyue kingdom, pacifying it the following year.

description.zh-cn: 元封二年（前109年），滇国归降汉朝，汉朝在其地设置益州郡。
description.en: In the second year of Yuanfeng (109 BC), the Dian Kingdom surrendered to the Han dynasty, which then established Yizhou Commandery in its territory.

description.zh-cn: 夜郎王兴于前27年举兵反汉，被汉朝派兵诛灭。
description.en: In 27 BC, King Xing of Yelang raised troops in rebellion against the Han, but was defeated and killed by Han forces.

description.zh-cn: 元鼎六年（前111年），句町王毋波率部归附汉朝。
description.en: In the sixth year of Yuanding (111 BC), King Wubo of Gouding led his people to submit to the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 始元五年（前82年），句町首领亡波奉汉昭帝调遣，参与平息益州地区的反叛。
description.en: In the fifth year of Shiyuan (82 BC), Wang Bo, leader of Gouding, was dispatched by Emperor Zhao of Han to participate in suppressing a rebellion in the Yizhou region.

description.zh-cn: 因平叛有功，汉昭帝于始元六年（前81年）封亡波为句町王。
description.en: For his merit in suppressing the rebellion, Emperor Zhao of Han enfeoffed Wang Bo as King of Gouding in the sixth year of Shiyuan (81 BC).

description.zh-cn: 汉末时期，孙策曾为军阀袁术的部下。
description.en: During the late Han dynasty, Sun Ce served as a subordinate to the warlord Yuan Shu.

description.zh-cn: 考古学表明，马家浜文化与河姆渡文化有明显的继承关系。
description.en: Archaeology indicates a clear line of succession from the Hemudu culture to the Majiabang culture.

description.zh-cn: 崧泽文化是马家浜文化的直接继承者。
description.en: The Songze culture is the direct successor to the Majiabang culture.

description.zh-cn: 良渚文化继承了马家浜文化。
description.en: The Liangzhu culture inherited from the Majiabang culture.

description.zh-cn: 良渚文化继承了崧泽文化。
description.en: The Liangzhu culture inherited from the Songze culture.
